elements.label: Who are you, *really*? Human Resources needs to know.
Email
elements.caption: This must be the same email you gave to Knight Hacks. This is important enough to break character for.

elements.label: Shirt Size
elements.caption: Because We Care About Your Comfort (and Our Branding), Pick a Size.

elements.label: Cybersecurity Experience
elements.caption: How much do you know about computer security?

elements.label: Help us match you to the perfect IHPL team!
Do you have a preferred team?
elements.caption: If so, have everyone put the same Team Name here.

elements.label: What days are you free?
elements.caption: What days you can work for us? The HLF does not sleep on weekends!

elements.label: Knight Hacks
elements.caption: I agree that I am at least 18 years old and will register for Knight Hacks in the next 24 hours.
